enableSearch.description: Whether or search should be enabled for GitHub Docs in the generated _config.yml file.
enableSearch.title: boolean

enforceDescriptions.description: Whether or not descriptions for each module export should be required.
enforceDescriptions.title: boolean

enforceExamples.description: Whether or not @example tags for each module export should be required. (Note: examples will not be enforced in module documentation)
enforceExamples.title: boolean

enforceVersion.description: Whether or not @since tags for each module export should be required.
enforceVersion.title: boolean

projectHomepage.description: Will link to the project homepage from the Auxiliary Links of the generated documentation.
projectHomepage.title: string

outDir.description: The directory to which docgen will generate its output markdown documents.
outDir.title: string

theme.description: The theme that docgen will specify should be used for GitHub Docs in the generated _config.yml file.
theme.title: string

sourceTsConfig.description: The path to the source tsconfig.json file for the project.
sourceTsConfig.title: string

baseTsConfig.description: The path to the base tsconfig.json file for the project.
baseTsConfig.title: string

exclude.description: An array of glob strings specifying files that should be excluded from the documentation.
